2922.author: undefined
2922.message: Set the inset as: this.setPadding(Rectangle.inset(4,2)).  This gives it a more pleasing appearance with a border, and also makes it easier to select near the bounds.

2926.storedString:
This is an example to test this implementation of HyperCard. We decided to use it as a possibility to conduct a survey.
To participate in it, add a new card and enter your information. Or simply build your own application in good old HyperCard. ;)

3601.author: sstamm
3601.message: forward and back buttons work when they are not direct children of the HC

3603.author: athomschke
3603.message: added API methods find() and gotoCard()

3609.author: athomschke
3609.message: Made HyperCard_Card behave like world (enabled selections)

3613.author: athomschke
3613.message: style adjustment of cards and hide button fixed

3615.author: athomschke
3615.message: refactored a lot and disabled script and connections copying

3625.author: athomschke
3625.message: set Color to red if in Edit Background mode

3627.author: athomschke
3627.message: remember list focus on move, add and remove cards

3649.author: athomschke
3649.message: a little layout and sticking adjustment

3665.author: athomschke
3665.message: adapted to new GetSelectedIndexes() Functionality and created a default presentation

3667.author: athomschke
3667.message: allowed dragging submorphs of background with left mouse button

3669.author: athomschke
3669.message: implemented copy Background on Card creation

3671.author: athomschke
3671.message: implemented a proper background func. TODO: consider submorphs of background morphs, too.

3673.author: athomschke
3673.message: It is possible to apply scripts and connections ;)

3677.author: athomschke
3677.message: bugfixing. as there are some magic connections: try to recreate morphs for find them!

3687.author: athomschke
3687.message: Refactored List of HyperCards to an Array

3693.author: conradcalmez
3693.message: allowed selection on the background, too
